name: Batch RPG
description:
Batch RPG is my very first public game made by Tom (NeonNation). The scriptings/coding language used to make this game is called Batch (bat), it can be very useful for stuff like backing up files/data that you need. This game includes:

  • Fighting mechanics
  • Skills/Perks
  • Levelling System
  • As you increase your combat skill the enemy gets more attack damage as well

Join our Discord for mods, report bugs, talk about the game, and give suggestions!

https://dsc.lol/batchrpg
